meanings.definition: The quality or state of being round or plump.
meanings.sent1: Her rotundnesses made her a perfect fit for the role of Mrs. Claus in the school play.
meanings.sent2: The rotundnesses of the pumpkin made it ideal for carving into a jack-o'-lantern.
meanings.sent3: The rotundnesses of the snowman's belly made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The rotundnesses of the full moon illuminated the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The rotundnesses of the basketball made it bounce in unexpected directions.

meanings.definition: The roundness or plumpness of a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The rotundnesses of the baby's cheeks were irresistible to pinch.
meanings.sent2: The rotundnesses of the watermelon indicated it was ripe and juicy.
meanings.sent3: The rotundnesses of the teddy bear made it extra cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The rotundnesses of the hill made it a challenging climb.
meanings.sent5: The rotundnesses of the clouds created interesting shapes in the sky.
